title: Three team mates couldn't connect to game including me and it wasn't loss prevented.(ranked)
body:
-17 lp, Clearly not my fault. Not even prevented. cmon.. WHAT THE FUCK.

Forgot to mention, It's that "firewall error" type thing. I can't even join a custom. going to bed. pfft.

replies.body: And now I dc'd mid game and can't reconnect because I'm getting more firewall errors gees I want to %%%%ing rage right now.

We're investigating an issue that may be giving a firewall error at the moment - check out [this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=33L0UwJA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-03T23:57:46.595+0000)
>
> We're investigating an issue that may be giving a firewall error at the moment - check out [this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.

Will the loss of LP be compensated for? Because I am quite annoyed.
